content.detailedDescription: At the time we saw this, we lived on hobson drive.  when we drove to hobson rd. going out to philadelphia rd., we could see it on the right.  we took a right on philadelphia rd., and we parked at a church on the left.  we saw a couple of people on a back deck across the street pointing and looking at it in a smaller house (we don't know them and didn't stop by).  the ufo is close to the mansion on the road (almost above it).  we looked at it for a while in the car because we were kind of scared.  finally, my wife got her waterproof camera and got out of the car.  there were no dark clouds in the sky at the time.  when my wife and i got out of the car, the light turned into a cloud.  we managed to film the cloud hoping the ufo would come out.  it never did.  we think the ufo changed or camouflaged itself into a cloud for disguise.
content.summary: Bright object moving

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a triangle formation of lights outside my front window so, i ran out to my front lawn to observe more closely. the light formation passed my house running parallel with my street and then hoovered at the end of my street then two of the three lights headed upward and dimmed to nothing. while the third light maintained position for a few more seconds before blinking out. i took a picture.
content.summary: Lights in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: Two black objects flew in the sky to the west of our home.   upon using bonoculars, my son and i saw a more tan color craft.   from the ground they looked black.   they seemed to be travelling together in a south to sw pattern. the following ufo went up and down and then disappeared.   the lead craft maintained a southern direction and also disappeared.
content.summary: Two black objects

content.detailedDescription:
Like a week or so previous, this time my wife was out walking the dog just before 11:00 pm. eastern standard time. she purposely looked toward the north northwest night sky where we had seen a star like ufo a week or so previous. she observed the same star like ufo, pulsing with brilliant colors of red, white, green and blue. there were no spokes like before, just a more round object emitting brilliant light. my wife called me out to view the ufo like last week on our deck. i could see it without the binoculars, as well as with them.  i brought out my telescope again and observed the object through the telescope. brilliant colors, more condensed than before, no aura or spoke like emissions this time.
i could view it in the telescope for a few minutes but would need to adjust the telescope over towards the north direction.
it hovered, moved slowly. finally disappeared, whether by its own or high cloud cover towards the north. hard to tell.  
total time we saw the object was 30 minutes total. it was 35 degrees off horizon, slightly higher than previous week, but still travelled slowly in same north north west direction lower to horizon.
what catches your eye with this object is its sheer brilliant colors that seem to pulsate from it as it remains almost stationary.
we felt it was the same object as before, similar except for lack of aura.
content.summary: Brilliant star like pulsing ufo

content.detailedDescription: I just got out of my car, and i saw the sky, and i observed a dark colored moving object in the sky. at first, i thought it was a bird, but it was not moving fast like a bird. i asked my husband what he thought it was. at first, he thought it was balloon. as it got closer over head, we realized that it was in the shape of a  boomerang or a pair of pants, and reflected lights. and because of its erratic course of travel, sometimes hovering, we knew it was something very unusual. it went far out into the sky and disappeared into the high clouds.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke at 10pm and noticed a bright orange glowing ball come from behind the trees. no noise at all and it moved very slowly. it looked like a big fireball. the glow would occasionally flicker in and out, it then stopped and hovered until the glow would flicker out completely and i couldn't see it anymore. then another one would come from the same place behind the trees, move slowly to the same spot hover and fade out again. this happened 5-6 times until i saw and heard a plane fly through the same location, and it never came back.
content.summary: Noticed. a large glowing ball hovering and then flickering out

content.detailedDescription:
Taking out my camera at night to view and possibly film ufos where they usually appear got me filming something quite unusual but interesting.

after sitting at a restaurant planter for about 20 minutes i noticed 2 dimly shaped objects to my left far across the street.  i could not make out what they were with my naked eye, so i zoomed in on them with my camera.  i saw tree branches with strange looking brown things on them then when i moved my camera to the right slowly i saw 5" in diameter bubbles here and there.  then i saw 5 bubbles clustered together where the bottom one was giving off a greenish glow slowly pulsating.  then one bubble slipped, but went back on the other 4.  the cluster was very uniform most of the time where the bubbles interlocked with each other perfectly.  the other bubbles (numbering 15 or so) stayed around the cluster perfectly still.

a dvd i already filmed shows these same type bubbles, as i accidentally filmed them for a moment.  i thought it had to do with lighting and/or my camera, but i guess not.

i heard years ago that extraterrestrials are doing things to our environment something that has to do with microbes or genes.
content.summary: Extraterrestrial dna?

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my night vision camera recording anomalies.  a round white object came into view with normal eyesight.  i got my camera on it as soon as i could.  after some seconds tracking it, it flared up much larger than original size, but only momentarily.  after getting back to original size, it continued on the same heading.  i followed it for some time, and still have the full length recording.  
i have posted it, along with another similar sighting on a previous date.  they are grouped together in this video:  
[youtube link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: White orb moving slowly, then flares momentarily to 50 times original size

content.detailedDescription: As i was watching out my bedroom window i saw this triangular ship..Here is a picture of what i saw...John price
content.summary: This was sighted outside of the bedroom window

content.altitude: Landed, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Please reference above.  the bottom line is that i missed my flight to california and slept in the airport.  a number of non-human entities attempted to take me with them on their space ship.  this is not a joke.  i filed a report with the legal department of the tsa in new orleans with a miss tracy tyler back in october of 2014.  i would never lie about something this serious.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: I missed my flight to california and slept in the airport. i was awoken via shock from non human entities trying to take control of me.  i professed the name of the lord and they departed.  true story.  on video tape.  i want my video footage.

content.detailedDescription:
While at work, i have 25 min. of video of an object i saw. .The object was cylinder shaped, color was a light hazy gray, but the object was transparent. estimated size to be ten(10) to (12) ft. in length. 3 ft. in width. slow and fast movements, no sound at all
at certain points during recording the object is hovering then shootsupward at a high rate of speed going out of camera viewing range. the object "pivots" in mid air when it turns. another point the object is on the ground by an old garage. the object jumps up on the crown of the garage and makes one more jump on the roofs crown then floats upward a short distance also it would shape-shift.  it did go below the surface of the pavement coming back up on the other side of a fenceline. railroad tracks are aldo nearby.

the weather for this area for dec. 7, 2012 at 11:00pm was 50Â° temp. heavy rainfall, wind at 4 to 5 mph.
the.Video has distortion due to the heavy rain and many lights in the area. 
but this object is not distortion, light relection or camera malfunction. 

ivr been in my line of work for 40 years and never saw anything like this. i never use to believe in ufo's. did not think they were real...All if that changed in 25minutes that night in december 2012.
i can not post my video due to employement loss.
i
content.summary: This was a once in a lifetime event for me and has changed my outlook

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog and i had my satellite app open on my iphone and had the hubble telescope selected.   it was displayed on the phone as just coming over the horizon but still blocked by terrain and houses.   i was facing due west.  the sky was 100% clear with an almost full moon in the eastern part of sky.  

as i was waiting for the hubble i was looking almost straight up, about an 80 degree angle from the horizon.  i noticed faint movement of light; just a dot that was very dim.  i checked the app and no satellites of any kind were shown for that area.  the object moved from south to north in the western sky on what seemed like an orbital path.  it passed above venus but below ursa  major.   i used my high power green laser to point at it.  the laser goes at least 20 miles.   i lazed it for about a minute then stopped and watched.   ten seconds later the dim light got super bright and flashed twice stopped then speed off in a different direction (west and up) then blinked out.  initially i thought it was a secret satellite but the flashing back, changing direction and blinking out makes me think it was a ship.  nothing in an orbital plane and at orbital speed could do what the object did.  just thought you would like to know.
content.summary: 100% clear night i was tracking satellites when one not on the app was sighted.  i lazed it more a minute then it flashed back twice, stopped and sped away in another direction then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving past on the highway in my car. i saw some black dots in the sky, and as i got closer, i at first thought they were balloons, but it was to large to be a balloon. there were several black ovals, floating still, then they moved. my first reaction was to take a picture. i lost sight of it, when i drove on the highway more.
content.summary: Drove past on the highway in my car, saw it floating outside, then took a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
This afternoon at about 5:00 pm i was sitting in my livingroom looking up at the sky for a moment.  it is may 17, 2015.  i was going to look away but for some reason a cloud formation caught my eye, just looked a little odd somehow.  it wasn't shaped in any form recognizable like a face or anything but still held my interest.  i then realized that the front of the longer thicker line of clouds was a more solid cloud and that at first thought maybe it was the stream from an airplane but the stream behind it looked way too thick for that.

i watched the front of the 'cloud' with my binoculars and that confirmed that the front in fact was much denser and solid looking and in fact looked a bit like an oval but still most of it was covered in misty cloud so can't be fure of the shape.

i watched the front of it as it passed from nw to almost due west when all of a sudden a jet came screaming in the same path where the 'cloud' had been and in the same direction towards it.

at first i thought it was just a coincidence but when i picked up the binoculars again to look at the 'cloud' front i saw that the plane's residue line in fact was parallel with that of the 'cloud' and not far from it either.  that looked too strange to be a coincidence.  the positioning screamed that it was in fact chasing the 'cloud'.

then after the plane disappeared from site to the west i realized that the 'cloud' had formed the letter z in the sky which means it went in those directions to form that letter and not only that but i was stunned when the z plainly stayed in the same position in the sky in the west for over 3/4 of an hour.  i have never seen a formation of clouds lasting more than a couple of minutes if that but this pattern was sticking.  very strange indeed.

the sky is mostly blue today and the weather is still and warm.  there are wispy clouds here and there but many are lower to the horizon whereas this 'cloud' formation was much much higher up which also made it stand out.

usually i don't pay much attention to clouds but have seen pictures by people who say there are ufos in the pictures of clouds but i find most of them a stretch however this sighting was very unusual, moved unlike any flying vehicle i know of and the vapour as i said lasts much longer than the usual clouds we all have seen.

at first i thought the object was the trail of a jet but the trail was way too thick for that as the front was moving in a slow but deliberate path and the front was more solid as i said.

when i first saw the object i was still thinking it might be a plane trail or just an odd cloud but couldn't take my eyes off it.  it was then i realized it was moving and not like a cloud but like the tail was being led by the oval solid object at th front of it - attached it seemed.  there was no color i could see just cloud like.  i wasn't afraid or anything but definitely amazed because as i said i have never really bought into cloud like ufos but will pay more attention from now on.

i lost sight of the object when it went around the backside of my home and i wasn't able to get out to follow it further.  actually i think it still hung in the letter z near the bottom left side of the z for quite a time as that spot appeared a more solid cloud like form.  it was very interesting.
content.summary: Noticed what i first thought was a cloud or trail from a jet but then realized it had a more solid oval front and trailing it was like a thicker jet stream.  moved slower across the sky than a plane would and faster than a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and kids and i were watching the sun set from a road out in the country side with a very nice view of the setting sun approximately at dusk looking across an open flat field.  my wife and i both caught the silhouette of an opaque rectangular object against the sun.  the object's ratio was approximately twice as long as it was tall or high.  at first, we thought it was an airplane or blimp. we live close to the air force base that commonly has c-5 gallaxy cargo planes traveling to the west.  we have never seen a blimp in this area, but from the size of the object, a blimp at the right distance could have been large enough, although not the right shape.  this was far more angular than a classic blimp shape.  the fact that it completely blocked out the sun and while observing it, did not appear to be moving at all with respect to the sun.  we expected to see its position change with respect to the sun, but for the twenty minutes, or so, that we observed it, that never happened.  its appearent size did not increase or decrease with time either as you would expect with an object such as an airplane that is either directly receeding from or heading streight at you.  the object's appearent size was approximately the size of a tic-tac held 12-18" in front of your face, buit more rectangular than rounded and as stated previously, was completely black against the sun without any indication of lights, wings, fins, langing gear, engines, or any other common aerospace vehicle features.  the object's position with respect to the sun was centrally located with a slight position to the east north-east quadrant of the sun.  during observation, its position against the sun did not change even as the sun was setting.  
my wife suggested that we travel to a different road to get a better view.  we got back in the car and moved about five miles and got out and observed it again as having the same relative size, shape and orientaiton with respect to the sun.  the sun was approximately 5 degrees over the horizon and i was now convinced that this was not a normal sight.  i tried to get a picture fo the object with the phone's camera, but couldn't get the camera to focus on the object against the sun.  i'm nit sure if the camera lens was smudged or wasn't able to resolve the image against the direct sun.  within thirty seconds, the sun had fully dropped below the horizon and the object was not longer visible.  i now regret not having taken a video or a picture.  
in my opinion, i do not think the object was in the earth's atmosphere.  if it was, its motion would to have been such that its appearent size did not change for twenty minutes and was moving in such a way to stay perfectly synchronized with the position of the sun from our vantage point.  i believe that it was an extremely large object closer to the sun than the earth.  i do not believe that this could have possibly been an airplane.  i would be very interested to know if anyone else had observed the object and thier estimation of the size, shape, motion, and position.  a secondary viewpoint would help to identify the size and distance via triangulation and verify what we observed.  this was a very unusual object.
content.summary: Observation of a large rectangular silhouette stationary with respect to the setting sun that was far too large to be an airplane or other conventional craft

content.detailedDescription: Since the first of may. my husband, my dog and myself have observed multiple objects both seen and unseen firing upon one another. over the last few years i have observed that the unfriendly or those who want something that the local objects have are usually appear dark or dimly lit. it makes it easier to tell the good guys from the bad. the local objects that i have been in reqular contact with are usually brightly lit and easy to see. they make no bones about their presence in our area. there is a large deposit of u-238 or uranium underground here in barry county. it is well known that the ufo's seem to crave this element and the local friendly bunch seems to have gotten here first and they have staked their claim on it before other apposing groups could somewhere around the beginning of the civil war. they reach this uranium by means of a series of caves and tunnels, one of which thanks to an exaction for a new water main, i found runs near my house, they accidently broke through it digging up the ground for the new water main or i would be a doubter myself if i had not seen it for myself. the tunnels were used during the civil war for a field hospital and an ammo dump by the south. this is why i have the date set for some time around the civil war. this is in the local historical records. how long before that is unknown as the length of time of the tunnels exisitance. there appears to a ongoing battle for the uranium but here lately they have exculpated their battle for control for some reasons. mu dog pointed toward the ne sky last night but there was no visable objects in that part of the sky, but the sky was completely overcast with clouds and we did have some minor damage from what i assume to be a f-0 or f-l tornado or funnel cloud, uprooted small trees and some small trees split in half which fits that type of tornado it happened around 1 am. mot sure if the ufo's were in vovoled the damage or not/ mo proof. i am not sure what this maybe leading up to if it keeps on going they way it is now going and exculationg.
content.summary: Over the last several weeks, i have observed objects firing at each other at night in our neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I was watching television around 7:00 pm on a week night while waiting for my wife to get home from work.  i heard coyotes howling abnormally loud over the sound of the tv.  i walked outside to investigate and noticed 6 bright white lights flashing simultaneously about 2 miles to the southeast.  they were in a straight line and appeared to be about 1000 feet above the ground.  i first assumed that they were just a group of c-130 aircraft, from a nearby air force base, on night maneuvers, which is not uncommon.  after observing them for several seconds, i realized that i could not hear their familiar sound and then i noticed that the white strobe lights were flashing simultaneously instead of individually.  after several minutes of watching these lights to see if they would get out of flash sequence, they never did, and i also noticed that they never changed position the entire time, as if just hovering.  after several minutes, of observing these 6 strobe lights, a very bright spot light shined on me from directly over head.  i was unable to ascertain the elevation of this light due to its intensity, but i estimated its elevation at 100 to 200 feet.  there was absolutely no sound at all.  i did not have a clue as to what this object was and still don't.  the light was bright enough to see the ground around me on a very dark night.  this spot light shined on me for about one full minute and i was so mesmerized that i could not look away.  after a minute the spot light turned off and as the light was dimming, the object started moving very slowly to the south.  i really never saw a structured object due to the intensity of the spot light.  the event was suddenly over and i have never been able to figure out what happened.  i often wonder about the event, but try not to dwell on it.
content.summary: Coyotes howling louder than normal prompted me to go outside.  after observing 6 bright white lights flashing simultaneously, about 2 miles to the southeast, a spot light turned on directly over my head

content.detailedDescription: On a road trip, first saw above griswold, ia.  stayed in that place for around 40 minutes as we approached, passed thru, & for about 5 miles north of town.   on the way back at end of trip, we teased that we would see our "friends" again.  as  we exited the interstate, and passed through atlantic, ia. we saw the pulsating light in the sky south and west of the hwy to the home place.  when we left atlantic, it came down to head level of the car, stayed just above the fence on the right hand-side of the car and followed us all the way to about 2 miles outside shenandoah, ia. where it just disappeared.  but it kept pace with our car no matter what the terrain, up or down hills, round curves, etc..  the trips were done late at night between 10pm to 5/6pm.  i thought it was a ufo and wanted to stop and say hi, and find out who, what and where they were from.  but my mother was afraid and whenever i suggested it she would say "drive, just drive."  just before it disappeared, i ask my mother if these people followed us home did we have enough food to feed them, just teasing her.  then they were gone.  my mother said she was sure it was from offit air force base in omaha, nebr.  the strangest thing about this time was that all you could really see was the light that started as a blossom in the center and then shot out a line of bright white light, almost searing in intensity, in all 4 directions; longer to front, back and up then down.  did this every 5 seconds or so continuously for the duration of the visit.
content.summary: Came down to head level in car; and stayed at top of fences to our right from outside alantic to just outside shenandoah  the light started in the middle and expanded out in all 4 directions, pulsating but silent.

content.detailedDescription: We were going to steinhatchee this morning and as i was watching a cloud i saw a cigar shape, seemed whitish blue heading for the cloud, before it reached the cloud another cigar shaped whitish blue ufo came out of the cloud and headed  toward the gulf. the first one then vanished into the cloud. i watched the second one for a few moments and then it vanished also. they both seemed about the same altitude which was cloud height.
content.summary: Two cigar shaped ufo during daylight near gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i had been watching 2 triangles, a smaller mover and a dark ship it was flying around with 3 lights around its perimeter when a glowing neon green ball of light flew over the trees from the se and dissappeared over some trees to our e..At first i thought maybe it had been a big intense fireworks ..But the color was so saturated it appeared unreal..Cartoon like..Then i realized a craft had takeoff..I heard no sound  but it was vy winhh
content.summary: My girlfriend & i had been watching 2 triangles a smaller mover and a dark ship it was flying around with 3 lights around its perimeter when a glowing neon green ball of light flew over the trees from the se and dissappeared over some trees to our e

content.detailedDescription:
On property taking pictures of my old dog noon before 1pm  facing east towards i-25 approx mile marker 63 to 62 direction.. first noticed an  object had been captured in the picture reviewing them.  didn't notice a thing sight or sound  while taking pictures focusing on the dog.

what did i think, reflection blurr from the sun off a  weather balloon seen them before in this area.. odd for it not being in other photos taken withing moments of the same area.  then another dark spot in another photo (last photo) in a different area. was odd

went back outside to scan the sky about 5 minutes later and there was nothing at all and usually weather balloons you can see for a long time before they too high and still you can see the relfection
content.summary: Accidential photo capture, not noticed by me until review of photos

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Working in back yard - saw object in sky thought it was airplane at first than realize there were no wings and nearly blunt ends front and back - looked to be aluminum in color with two square/rectangular patches toward front and two patches toward rear that were brighter as if polished or more reflective - speed was simular to airplane at best guess 10k feet? moved in straight line in the direction of the cylinder length - was clearly awe shocked - when could blocked from view i ran to grab my camera in hopes the i would catch a picture on the other side of clouds but never could relocate - gave me an adrenalin rush and felt kind of nauseated following event/sighting - still feel some anxiety and alone - would really like to have a collaborating witness to this sighting - the attached pictures are the closest images i could find on the internet that represents what i saw in the sky.
content.summary: Cigar shaped - south bound - speed simular to airplane

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from walmart i noticed a huge dark object getting closer. saw that is was a saucer shap and moving slow, blackish color and no noise. it came from the south and headed north. flew right over me, then climbed over the clouds. i live about 30 miles from mexico and north of me, about 15 miles we have a federal aerostat with radar to detect smugglers, illegal people and airplanes.  the craft would have had to fly over the arreostat. i was kind of in a daze, like didi just see that?
content.summary: Huge blackish color saucer shap.  no noise or spinnig.

content.detailedDescription: One night i woke up about 3 am, i noticed 3 grey aliens at the foot of my bed  my body was  paralyzed and  i was unable to move or speak.  one of the aliens inserted a thin metal rod into my lower stomach area there was no pain  but i was scared at the time i was only 10 years old.  i never told anyone about this encounter except my wife.
content.summary: Alien encounter

content.detailedDescription: While checking video camera ..We observed bright figure in driveway ..Motionless ..It then flew rose and left.
content.summary: Super bright figure caught on our serveilence camera.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a randomly-flickering orange light which appeared to be a flare, or fire source, just under cloud layer. originally thought it may have been a firework/meteorite. was moving in a slow, straight path from se to ne of my position. flickering orange light went out abruptly and a black disc became very plainly visible in its place, against the lighter cloud cover. disc continued on a straight path to the ne of my position. made no noise. flickering light did not return. flickering light was visible for first 30sec - 1min30sec. disc was visible for another 5min, then was too far away to notice. lost sight of object over lake ontario, ne of hamilton.
content.summary: "burning" disc observed

content.detailedDescription:
While in my backyard cleaning my pool i noticed a flashing object out of the corner of my eye. thought it was a plane or helicopter but the longer i looked i realized there was no sound coming from the sky. also noticed that object was stationary. i ren into my house and grabbed my nikkon digital camera and took a couple of pics resolution was in upwards of 5400x3048  zoomed as far as camera allowed.  got a couple of shots and while repositioning the object moved west and laid a white streak in the sky. i was pissed off to be honest. i switched to video mode and shot what i could object moved at such high speed it was gone,traveled from one side of mt. diablo to the other in a matter of seconds. my comments on video upon reviewing were"that was bullshit"  i came into the house and uploaded the pics and video on laptop and when i zoomed in i was freaking out because the object was like nothing i could grasp in my mind. it appears as though its flexible with round inner twinned hoses linking it together.  the video just shows numerous ordbs of various colors coming in and out of screen. it was vary hard to track do to the speed it was traveling  to this day im miffed and shook up. what the f&^^& could this thing be, dropping vapors in my,our atmosphere?

i also attached a pic of a black object flying in the trail of a large jet it appears to be a stealth bommer
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed object hovering in sky so ran into house and got camera took couple pics the while observing object rapidly moved and left a white streak in the sky. switched to video mode and object traveled at high speed to the west. was able to get video

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime between about january or february 1961 and 1963, i'd stayed the night in the walhalla hotel with my father in the little hamlet of walhalla in a deep forested valley in eastern victoria.  walhalla is an old mining town, and 'slag' heaps could still be seen on parts of the valley sides then. at that time - and until only recently in fact - the town had  no main grid power supply and all buildings including the hotel had their own generators (the hotel's generator was switched off at about 10.30pm and back on again early in the morning).  this meant that if you were close to the hotel, you could hear the generator hum in the background.

being summer, when we came out of the hotel at about 10.30 - 11 am, it was a very bright day with no clouds, so there was nothing to obscure the view of the sky.  we noticed a fellow a short way down the street looking straight up into the sky, and we walked up to him to see what he was looking at. somehow, he'd noticed a small black triangular object at a height of perhaps 2000 feet sitting dead still in the sky.  i can recall when i looked up at it that it was a perfect black isoceles triangle with no apparent wings or any other extensions.  after a few minutes, more people walked up and joined our group - someone had some binoculars and i was able to borrow them to look at it.  strangely, it didn't seem to be any closer when i looked at it through the binoculars and this was also something my father had mentioned.

after about perhaps ten or fifteen minutes, i experienced a strong wave of fatigue, and i closed my eyes for a few minutes.  this was not entirely unusual, as i've been sensitive to very bright light, but when i opened my eyes, two things had occurred.  firstly, the object - which was still sitting dead still in the sky - had seemingly moved a bit higher, and secondly the light seemed to be slightly different. my father walked away for a few minutes and when he came back, he told me that his watch was wrong - that the time was now about 1pm.  he said it had never done that before and couldn't understand why. 

i didn't realise the significance of this until i spoke to someone who had seen a really large ufo over bentleigh - another melbourne suburb - in about 1973.  he told me that even though he was only watching it for about twenty minutes, about an hour and a half had passed. my recollection regarding the light was that it was different because it was slightly later in the day and the sun had moved across the sky.  perhaps my father's watch was right after all...  were we missing about two hours?  was this because we were in the intensified gravity field of an advanced spacecraft and that the time in our immediate position had slowed down relative to normal time? 

could the black object have been a kite?  if it was, the only reason it could have remained still for so long was if someone had stretched lines across from one ridge to the next - hardly likely.  there is one other possibility.  not far to the east is sale raaf air base.  could they have been involved in testing some sort of highly classfiied aircraft?

 might add that as far as i know, my father's watch was an enicar - he bought a couple on ships on his travels.  from what i've read, they tend to be quite reliable.  as he bought it in the early 1960's, i'd say the likelyhood of it being a fake was not that likely, but as said in the story, it had never done that before.

as far as i can recall, we watched the object until we decided to leave - i think it was still there.
content.summary: My father and i saw a person looking straight up in the main street at the object and proceeded to keep looking until we left.

content.detailedDescription: It was around midnight when i was taking my dogs outside with a friend. i was staring at the stars. i could see a couple of planes in the horizon flying low, either descending or ascending with lights over the wings and in the front. i noticed two air crafts flying side by side with some space between them over my head. they were high above the commercial planes. they were silent. i saw them dangerously weaving in and out towards each other as though they were having fun in the air or space flying. i never saw them touch each other. they flew in the same direction moving straight. my friend couldn't see them without glasses. i kept my eyes on the two aircraft wondering why are they flying without lights on. they were out of my view within two minutes. they moved very quickly. i did not see wings on the air craft. i only saw the body of the air craft which was cylinder like two slim bullets in the sky. 110% they were air craft. they moved swiftly a part and then very close to each other still without touching. i either saw two ufo air crafts or two government jets flying much much higher than the commercial planes. i saw a plane after the two air crafts were gone. the plane was much lower, slower, and it had lights blinking on visible wings. these aircrafts were not commercial planes. i'm not sure if anyone else saw these two air crafts in june/july 2011 at night.
content.summary: Two dark objects flying dangerously close to each other with no lights on. almost like a game.

content.detailedDescription: In the winter of 1989, while driving home from a high school football game, i saw three lights in triangular formation hovering through low hanging clouds.  they were huge, in perfect geometric formation, and were very bright.  i lived in rural missouri so the road was just a smooth surface along a stretch of homes.  i slowed down and rolled down my window but heard nothing.  perplexed, i pulled over to the small patch of road that passed for a shoulder and turned off my car.  i got out and stared at the three large lights that held position in the clouds.  i looked around, saw the lights of the school football field in the distance, and also noticed two other people had pulled over to examine the lights.  we gave each other half shrugs, and thatâs when i realized i was looking at something i couldnât identify.  iâd never seen these hovering lights before and the lack of noise, like an engine, scared the hell out of me.  so i got back in my car and drove home as fast as i could.
content.summary: It hovered over me. 3 triangle lights, in clouds.  silent
